title: [MAC] Computer randomly restarts without warning during matches. Patcher client .spin files?
body:
Hey there!

So I'm running OS X Mavericks at the moment and the current, up-to-date Mac client for LoL. However, I was using El Capitan where I started encountering this problem.

Randomly, without warning of any kind, while I'm in a game my computer will just restart. There's no pop ups, no nothing at all. It just does it. I did some googling where I learned that this is generally caused by a Kernal panic and to check/post the .panic file online. Only problem with that is, there is none. I have no .panic file and there appears to have been no Kernal panic. What I do have are System Diagnostics files for the Patcher client, they end in .spin.

I'm no good with this technical stuff, nor do I even know what a .spin file is or what it is for, however, I'm wondering if anyone else is having/had this issue and knows of what to do to fix it or what to look for to see what the issue is? It was happening in El Capitan and I downgraded to Mavericks tonight where it's still continuing. Getting LeaverBuster for someone that's not my fault is annoying and I'd like to enjoy matches without worrying about whether or not I'm going to get a random restart :(

replies.body:
As far as I'm aware .spin files can basically be viewed with any text editor.

I'm not _too_ familiar with macs but feel free to reply with a link to your latest .spin file and i'll take a look at it to see if I can figure out what the issue is.

http://www.mediafire.com/download/d085g832o02d99b/LatestSPIN.zip

I can view the spin files easily, yes. But I'm unsure as to what they mean. I don't understand anything inside them. Hopefully these are somewhat understandable for you.

Yea, that doesnt help at all. haha.

Have you tried reinstalling the game at all? Does this happen in any other games?

Yes I have and no it doesn't. I've also tried rolling back from OS X El Capitain to Yosemite than Mavericks. It doesn't matter what the OS it happens only when League is open. It'll happen even when i just have the client logged in when not in a game. I'm not sure why but the LoLPatcher spin files are all I have to work with haha
